data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alqarni, Abdulaziz S., Hannan, Mohammed A., Engel, Michael S. (2014): A new species of the cleptoparasitic bee genus Thyreus from northern Yemen and southwestern Saudi Arabia (Hymenoptera, Apidae). ZooKeys 428: 29-40, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.428.7821, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.428.7821
